Message:
My harsh journey to the farthest
corners of the world...
reached its final act all too soon...

An army of demons suddenly
appeared one day, and made
the whole world a mess...

In the middle of ravaged
landscapes were villages
blanketed in flames...

All you could hear
from some towns...
were horrified screams...

I was saved by some
army members and brought
to an evacuation shelter,
so I was left unharmed...

Day in and day out,
I’d hear the same words
travel across the shelter.

Those words became
a curse sapping everyone’s
hope and energy...

It was like everyone was
just waiting to die...

The shelter’s door also
remained tightly shut,
so none of us were sure
what was happening outside...

So this’s the end of
the world...huh...

If the whole world gets destroyed,
what’s gonna happen to us...?
